p: Acute toxicity performed using the aqueous extract of whole plant of TI for fourteen days showed negative results at a dose of 5000 mg/kg on healthy male Wistar rats [ 105]. The methanolic extract of whole plant and leaf did not show 14 days oral acute toxicity at a dose of 2000 mg/kg/day on healthy Wistar rats and Swiss albino mice [ 12, 101]. The ethyl acetate extract of the aerial part of TI was given to healthy Swiss albino mice through intraperitoneal administration [ 51] using different doses. Doses of 60, 75, and 90 mg/kg for 14 days IP did not show any toxicity or mortality.
